A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: +1 Star for some really cool fight scenes\n+1 Star for some really great visuals\nI'm probably getting rid of my last Jedi t-shirt after this and I'm not overly interested in seeing another movie like this.  I feel like this will be another Phantom Menace; a movie that I watch every once in a while to re watch a few scenes but that's about it.
